/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the surroundings. The street is lined with lush green trees and shrubs, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. A few cars are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the presence of residents or visitors nearby. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The photo is taken from a low angle, which gives a unique perspective, making the viewer feel as if they are standing right there on the sidewalk, looking up at the buildings and the sky.
